title: Can Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard be shuffled into the Deck by the effect of Madolche Lesson?
question:
Can you target Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard when activating Madolche Lesson?

Also, when Madolche Lesson's effect resolves, can Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard be chosen as the 1 other monster to shuffle into the Deck?
answer:
Yes, you can target Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard when activating Madolche Lesson. In that case, Madolche Queen Tiaramisu will be returned to the Extra Deck.

Also, you can choose Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard as the 1 other monster to shuffle into the Deck during the resolution of Madolche Lesson's effect. In that case, Madolche Queen Tiaramisu will be returned to the Extra Deck.
llm_answer:
**Question 1:** Can you target Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard when activating Madolche Lesson?

**Answer:** Yes, you can target Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard when activating Madolche Lesson. Since Madolche Lesson's effect specifies targeting a "Madolche" monster in the Graveyard, it can target any "Madolche" monster, including Xyz Monsters like Madolche Queen Tiaramisu. 

**Resolution:** You can target and shuffle Madolche Queen Tiaramisu into the Deck with Madolche Lesson.

---

**Question 2:** When Madolche Lesson's effect resolves, can Madolche Queen Tiaramisu in your Graveyard be chosen as the 1 other monster to shuffle into the Deck?

**Answer:** Yes, Madolche Queen Tiaramisu can be chosen as the 1 other monster to shuffle into the Deck when Madolche Lesson resolves. Madolche Lesson's effect does not restrict the type of monster that can be shuffled into the Deck after the targeted "Madolche" monster is returned, so any monster, including Madolche Queen Tiaramisu, can be chosen.

**Resolution:** You can choose Madolche Queen Tiaramisu as the other monster to shuffle into the Deck.
